summary:
This save includes:

Main Quest completed
Dawnguard Main Quest completed with Dawnguard (Dwarven Crossbow unlocked)
Daedra Quests completed
All Guilds Quests completed (except for Dark Brotherhood. I exterminated all of them)
War Quest completed (joining the Imperial Legion)
Lots of Minor Quests completed
descriptionHtml:
As said in the small description, this save includes:

Main Quest completed
Dawnguard Main Quest completed with Dawnguard (Dwarven Crossbow unlocked)
Daedra Quests completed (except for Peryite)
All Guilds Quests completed (except for Dark Brotherhood. I exterminated all of them)
War Quest completed (joining the Imperial Legion)
Lots of Minor Quests completed

The save is pretty clean, the only mods I activated were Cabal\'s retextures, Arrows and Bolts Tweaks, SkyUI 3.0, Achieve That!, ImmersiveHUD, Better Dialogues Controls and Better MessageBox Controls, Categorized Favourites (ITALIAN), A Quality Map, Player Headtracking, Deadly Spells Textures, Unread Books Glow, Enhanced Blood Textures, Unofficial Patches (Skyrim, Dawnguard and Hearthfire).

Requires All Released DLCs (until Hearthfire).

I didn\'t use cheat to reach my level or increase my skills, neither to complete my quests (except for the Red Nirnroots one). If you dare to discover more, just give it a try.

For the complete ordered list of files you need, take a look at here:

Masters for: quicksave.ess
00 Skyrim.esm
01 Update.esm
02 Dawnguard.esm
03 Hearthfires.esm
04 Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp [Version 1.2.7]
05 Unofficial Dawnguard Patch.esp [Version 1.1.4]
06 Unofficial Hearthfire Patch.esp [Version 1.0.3]
07 SkyUI.esp
08 Headtracking.esp
xx ABT - Faster Arrows Improved +100%.esp
xx ABT - Faster Bolts Improved +100%.esp
xx ABT - Increased Bolts Damage (Vanilla) +150%.esp
xx ABT - Increased Progressive Damage (Vanilla) +150%.esp
xx ABT - Recover +50% Arrows and Bolts.esp
xx AchieveThat.esp
xx CatFavMenu_ITA_HircineFIX.esp
xx dD - Enhanced Blood Main.esp
xx dD-Dawnguard-EBT Patch.esp
xx DeadlySpellImpacts.esp
xx iHUD.esp
xx UnreadBooksGlow.esp

All the unique items and daedric artifacts are at the Sleeping Giant Inn, in the chest down the stairs behind the wardrobe.
author: GrimjoeXIII

files.name: Nord Male LVL 49 Skyrim and Dawnguard almost completed
